attributes.action: Change and improve the current legislation for the Domestic Abuse Act 2021.
attributes.additional_details: The current legislation in place is outrageous considering the social standing of the British state in the 21st century. People are not getting the correct support they deserve.
attributes.background: Change and improve the current legislation for the Domestic Abuse Act 2021. Provide effective support and legal structure for those suffering from domestic abuse.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you think the Domestic Abuse Act 2021 is not adequate, but we're not sure how you want this to be changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Introduce automatic comprehensive restraining orders for domestic abuse offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628012

Automatically remove domestic abusers from joint council tenancies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632260

Create a national register of perpetrators of domestic abuse: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624539

Require all police officers to receive domestic abuse training: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632610
